docs.text: Home The Makobot Hovering Autonomous Underwater Vehicle (HAUV) is a research platform for autonomous marine robotics research based on the BlueROV2. These instructions provide a set of augmentations which can be made to a BlueROV2 in order to provide more capabilities for autonomous operation.
docs.title: Home
